org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.stats.jobs

Class JobFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.stats.jobs.JobFactory

  • public class JobFactory
extends Object
    Factory that can produce Job instances for computing various RDF statistics
